WELCOME_MESSAGE:
Thank you for voting for the server!
You can pick up the award by writing the command - /vote
*You can vote every day and get a reward for this
TAKE_REWARD_MESSAGE:
You have successfully collected the voting reward!
You will be able to receive it the next time you vote for the server
TAKE_RETURN:
You have already taken the reward!
You can get it the next time you vote for the server
ALERTS_USER:
